content.raw: One thing I should have pointed out in the initial Pull Request is that this does make a semantic change in Converter::Remove.  Previously, Converter::Remove could have taken a string such as "elemC::elemD", and it might have done something with it.  However, it seemed to me that Remove should be symmetric with Add, so I removed that functionality, and now they both just take an "elemC" to remove.
content.html: One thing I should have pointed out in the initial Pull Request is that this does make a semantic change in Converter::Remove. Previously, Converter::Remove could have taken a string such as "elemC::elemD", and it might have done something with it. However, it seemed to me that Remove should be symmetric with Add, so I removed that functionality, and now they both just take an "elemC" to remove.
